passives.name: Arc Chain
passives.description: On hit, arcs lightning to up to 2 nearby enemies for 35% damage.

passives.name: Frost Tag
passives.description: On hit, slows the enemy's movement speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

passives.name: Bleed Edge
passives.description: Melee hits apply a bleed that deals 15% damage per second for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Piercing Rounds
passives.description: Projectiles pierce 1 additional enemy.

passives.name: Echo Strike
passives.description: Every 3rd attack instantly echoes for 50% damage.

passives.name: Shockwave
passives.description: Melee hits detonate a short-range shockwave around the target for reduced damage.

passives.name: Blood Siphon
passives.description: Melee hits siphon a small burst of health back to the attacker.

passives.name: Twin Shot
passives.description: Ranged attacks fire a second shot at the same target for reduced damage.

passives.name: Scattershot
passives.description: Ranged attacks also fire at up to 2 nearby enemies for reduced damage.

passives.name: Ricochet
passives.description: On projectile hit, the shot ricochets to a nearby enemy for reduced damage.

passives.name: Execute Mark
passives.description: If the target is below 20% HP, hits deal a finishing burst of bonus damage.

passives.name: Hex Bomb
passives.description: Hits place a volatile hex. If the enemy dies soon, it explodes and damages nearby enemies.

passives.name: Time Dilation
passives.description: On hit, briefly slows the target and nearby enemies.

passives.name: Phase Step
passives.description: Every 4th melee hit blinks you slightly through the enemy, dodging encirclement.

passives.name: Stagger
passives.description: Hits briefly 'stagger' the enemy, reducing their movement for a moment (doesn't stack).

passives.name: Overload
passives.description: Every 5th hit triggers a mini-arc to a random nearby enemy.

passives.name: Pinpoint
passives.description: Projectiles that hit an enemy also tag them; your next hit on that enemy echoes instantly.

passives.name: Vortex Tag
passives.description: Hits 'tag' enemies with a vortex. Tagged enemies take a small pulse if clustered.

passives.name: Cinder Brand
passives.description: Hits apply a burning brand that deals damage over time.

passives.name: Vampiric Bullets
passives.description: Projectile hits heal the attacker for a portion of damage dealt.

passives.name: Doomstack
passives.description: Hits build Doom. At 4 stacks (within a short window), the target detonates for big bonus damage and a small AoE.

passives.name: Hailburst
passives.description: Hitting a Frost-tagged enemy consumes the tag and shatters ice, damaging nearby enemies.

passives.name: Predator Instinct
passives.description: Bonus damage against enemies above 80% HP (great for opening hits).
